00016 // for low level routines from read_gadget.c
00017 int blksize, swap_rg = 0;
00018 #define SKIP  {my_fread(&blksize,sizeof(int),1,fd); swap_Nbyte((char*)&blksize,1,sizeof(int));}

00020 
00021 /* \brief Basic routine to read data from a file */
00022 /* Reads a slab from a given filestream
00023  * \param ptr: pointer for fread
00024  * \param size: size of slab
00025  * \param nmemb:
00026  * \param stream: filestream
00027  * \return nread: how many kilobytes were read?
00028  */
00029 size_t my_fread ( void * ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, FILE * stream ) {
00030     size_t nread;
00031 
00032     if ( ( nread = fread ( ptr, size, nmemb, stream ) ) != nmemb ) {
00033         std::cerr << "I/O error (fread) !" << std::endl;
00034         exit ( 3 );
00035     }
00036     return nread;
00037 }
00038 
00045 void swap_Nbyte( char *data, unsigned n, unsigned m ) {
00046     char old_data[ 16 ];
00047 
00048     if ( swap_rg > 0 ) {
00049         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
00050             memcpy( &old_data[ 0 ], &data[ i * m ], m );
00051             for ( unsigned j = 0; j < m; ++j ) {
00052                 data[ i * m + j ] = old_data[ m - j - 1 ];
00053             }
00054         }
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00064 int find_block ( FILE *fd, std::string label ) {
00065     int blocksize = 0;
00066     char label2[5] = {"    "};
00067     label.copy(label2,4);
00068     char blocklabel[ 5 ] = {"    "};
00069 
00070     rewind ( fd );
00071 
00072     while ( !feof ( fd ) && blocksize == 0 ) {
00073         SKIP;
00074         if ( blksize == 134217728 ) {
00075             std::cerr << "Enable ENDIAN swapping!" << std::endl;
00076             swap_rg = 1 - swap_rg;
00077             swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) & blksize, 1, sizeof( int ) );
00078         }
00079         if ( blksize != 8 ) {
00080             std::cerr << "Incorrect format (blksize = " << blksize << "d)!" << std::endl;
00081             exit ( 1 );
00082         } else {
00083             my_fread ( blocklabel, 4 * sizeof ( char ), 1, fd );
00084             my_fread ( &blocksize, sizeof ( int ), 1, fd );
00085             swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) & blocksize, 1, 4 );
00086             //          std::cout << "Found Block " << blocklabel
00087             //          << " with " << blocksize << " bytes." << std::endl;
00088             SKIP;
00089             if ( strcmp ( label2, blocklabel ) != 0 ) {
00090                 fseek ( fd, blocksize, 1 );
00091                 blocksize = 0;
00092             }
00093         }
00094     }
00095     return ( blocksize -8 );
00096 }

00113 int read_gadget_head ( unsigned* npart, double* Massarr, double* time, double* redshift, int* FlagSfr, int* FlagFeedback, unsigned* Nall, int* FlagCooling, int* NumFiles, double* BoxSize, FILE* fd ) {
00114     int blocksize, dummysize;
00115 
00116     blocksize = find_block ( fd, "HEAD" );
00117     if ( blocksize <= 0 ) {
00118         std::cerr << "Block " << "HEAD" << " not fond!" << std::endl;
00119         exit ( 5 );
00120     }
00121 
00122     dummysize = blocksize - 6 * sizeof ( int ) - 8 * sizeof ( double );
00123     SKIP;
00124     my_fread ( npart, 6 * sizeof ( unsigned ), 1, fd );
00125     swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) npart, 6, sizeof( unsigned ) );
00126     my_fread ( Massarr, 6 * sizeof ( double ), 1, fd );
00127     swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) Massarr, 6, sizeof( double ) );
00128     my_fread ( time, sizeof ( double ), 1, fd );
00129     swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) time, 1, sizeof( double ) );
00130     my_fread ( redshift, sizeof ( double ), 1, fd );
00131     swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) redshift, 1, sizeof( double ) );
00132     my_fread ( FlagSfr, sizeof( int ), 1, fd );
00133     swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) FlagSfr, 1, sizeof( int ) );
00134     my_fread ( FlagFeedback, sizeof( int ), 1, fd );
00135     swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) FlagFeedback, 1, sizeof( int ) );
00136     my_fread ( Nall, 6 * sizeof ( int ), 1, fd );
00137     swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) Nall, 6, sizeof( int ) );
00138     my_fread ( FlagCooling, sizeof( int ), 1, fd );
00139     swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) FlagCooling, 1, sizeof( int ) );
00140     my_fread ( NumFiles, sizeof( int ), 1, fd );
00141     swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) NumFiles, 1, sizeof( int ) );
00142     my_fread ( BoxSize, sizeof ( double ), 1, fd );
00143     swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) BoxSize, 1, sizeof( double ) );
00144     fseek ( fd, dummysize, 1 );
00145     SKIP;
00146 
00147     return blocksize;
00148 }

00158 template <typename T>
00159 int read_gadget_1 ( T *data, std::string label, FILE *fd ) {
00160     int blocksize;
00161     char label2[5] = {"    "};
00162     label.copy(label2,4);
00163 
00164     blocksize = find_block ( fd, label2 );
00165     if ( blocksize <= 0 ) {
00166         std::cerr << "Block " << label2 << " not found!" << std::endl;
00167         exit ( 5 );
00168     } else {
00169         std::cout << "Reading " << blocksize << " bytes of data from "
00170         << label << "..." << std::endl;
00171         SKIP;
00172         my_fread ( data, blocksize, 1, fd );
00173         swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) data, blocksize / sizeof ( T ), sizeof( T ) );
00174         SKIP;
00175     }
00176     return blocksize / sizeof ( T );
00177 }

00187 template <typename T>
00188 int read_gadget_3 ( T* data, std::string label, FILE* fd ) {
00189     int blocksize;
00190     char label2[] = {"    "};
00191     label.copy(label2, 4);
00192 
00193     blocksize = find_block ( fd, label );
00194     if ( blocksize <= 0 ) {
00195         std::cerr << "Block " << label << " not found!" << std::endl;
00196         exit ( 5 );
00197     } else {
00198         std::cout << "Reading " << blocksize << " bytes of data from " << label << "..." << std::endl;
00199         SKIP;
00200         my_fread ( data, blocksize, 1, fd );
00201         swap_Nbyte ( ( char* ) data, blocksize / sizeof ( T ), sizeof( T ) );
00202         SKIP;
00203     }
00204     return ( blocksize / sizeof ( T ) / 3 );
00205 }

00207 /* \brief Get particlenumber from a snapshot file */
00208 /* Get the number of particles stored inside a snapshot file.
00209  * \param filename
00210  * \param id_min
00211  * \param id_max
00212  * \param masses
00213  * \param npart
00214  * \param ntot
00215  * \param redshift
00216  * \param boxsize
00217  */
00218 void get_particle_number ( std::string filename, unsigned * id_min, unsigned * id_max, double * masses, unsigned * npart, unsigned& ntot , double& redshift, double& boxsize ) {
00219     FILE * fd = 0;
00220     int n;
00221     int FlagSfr, FlagFeedback, FlagCooling, NumFiles;
00222     unsigned Nall[ 6 ];
00223     double time;
00224     unsigned * id_block;
00225 
00226     if ( ! ( fd = fopen ( filename.c_str(), "r" ) ) ) {
00227         std::cerr << "Cannot open file " << filename << "!" << std::endl;
00228         exit ( 2 );
00229     }
00230 
00231     // read header to get global properties
00232     n = read_gadget_head ( npart, masses, &time, &redshift, &FlagSfr, &FlagFeedback, Nall, &FlagCooling, &NumFiles, &boxsize, ( FILE * ) fd );
00233 
00234     // show details
00235     ntot = 0;
00236     for ( int i = 0; i < 6; i++ ) {
00237         std::cout << "particle type ";
00238         std::cout.width( 5 );
00239         std::cout << i << ", count = ";
00240         std::cout.width( 10 );
00241         std::cout << npart[ i ] << ", fixed mass = ";
00242         std::cout.width( 10 );
00243         std::cout << masses[ i ] << std::endl;
00244         ntot += npart[ i ];
00245     }
00246     std::cout << "Time of snapshot = " << time << ", z = " << redshift << ", ntot = " << ntot << ", boxsize = " << boxsize << std::endl << std::endl;
00247 
00248     id_block = ( unsigned * ) malloc ( ntot * sizeof ( int ) );
00249 
00250     // read data blocks
00251     n = read_gadget_1 ( ( unsigned * ) id_block, "ID  ", fd );
00252     //for ( unsigned i = 0; i < ntot; ++i )
00253     //  id_block[ i ] = unsigned( id_block[ i ] );
00254     // search minima and maxima in ID-list
00255     // use counter to follow the list of particle numbers successively
00256     unsigned cntr = 0;
00257     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 4; ++j ) {
00258         id_min[ j ] = id_block[ cntr ];
00259         id_max[ j ] = id_block[ cntr ];
00260         for ( unsigned i = cntr; i < cntr + npart[ j ] - 1; ++i ) {
00261             if ( id_min[ j ] > id_block[ i ] )
00262                 id_min[ j ] = id_block[ i ];
00263             if ( id_max[ j ] < id_block[ i ] )
00264                 id_max[ j ] = id_block[ i ];
00265         }
00266         cntr += npart[ j ];
00267     }
00268     id_min[ 4 ] = id_max[ 3 ] + 1;
00269     id_max[ 4 ] = id_min[ 4 ] + npart[ 4 ];
00270     id_min[ 5 ] = 0;
00271     id_max[ 5 ] = 0;
00272     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 6; ++j ) {
00273         // give out ID range
00274         std::cout << "ID(" << j << ") in range: ";
00275         std::cout.width( 10 );
00276         std::cout << id_min[ j ] << ",";
00277         std::cout.width ( 10 );
00278         std::cout << id_max[ j ] << std::endl;
00279     }
00280     std::cout << std::endl;
00281 
00282     fclose ( fd );
00283     free ( id_block );
00284 }
